ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I'll recommend this class to new student in G&G, especially those who have no geology background before.

An introduction to the study of the earth, solar system and extrasolar planetary systems; with an emphasis on the variety of methods for investigating the properties of the planetary systems. A comparative cosmology of the planets. A selective investigation of the Earth and its unique place in the universe.

I feel that this class is a very general overview. While the material towards the end of the semester was new to me, the beginning of the semester was more of a review. I wouldn't recommend this class to someone who is looking for an in depth/detailed course on Earth and space science.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Considering my background to the course. I have a better understanding of the earth science.
